--- schema
type StructWithAnonymousTypes struct {
	fooField optional {String:String}
	barField nullable {String:String}
	bazField {String : nullable String}
	wozField {String:[nullable String]}
}
--- expected
{
  "StructWithAnonymousTypes": {
    "kind": "struct",
    "fields": {
      "fooField": {
        "type": {
          "kind": "map",
          "keyType": "String",
          "valueType": "String",
          "representation": { "map": {}}
        },
        "optional": true
      },
      "barField": {
        "type": {
          "kind": "map",
          "keyType": "String",
          "valueType": "String",
          "representation": { "map": {}}
        },
        "nullable": true
      },
      "bazField": {
        "type": {
          "kind": "map",
          "keyType": "String",
          "valueType": "String",
          "valueNullable": true,
          "representation": { "map": {}}
        }
      },
      "wozField": {
        "type": {
          "kind": "map",
          "keyType": "String",
          "valueType": {
            "kind": "list",
            "valueType": "String",
            "valueNullable": true
          },
          "representation": { "map": {}}
        }
      }
    },
    "representation": { "map": {}}
  }
}
---
